entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot install dotnet-ef tools - error NU1202: Package dotnet-ef 7.0.3 is not compatible with net60 (.NETFramework,Version=v6.0) #30341
  • HasQueryFilter on Relationship #30339
  • Inefficient heap allocation in SqlServerConvertTranslator #30338
  • Multiple left joins results in error #30337
  • EF6 : DTO with collection property generates LEFT JOIN instead INNER JOIN #30336
  • JSON/Sqlite: add support for non-string JSON paths for update #30335
  • JSON/Sqlite: use `->` and `->>` where possible when traversing JSON, rather than `json_extract` #30334
  • what is the best way to add our own namespace while generating the model via Scaffolding #30332

Closed

  • Json: add support for Sqlite provider #28816
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Evaluate SqlServerConvertTranslator.SupportedMethods once #30340
    auto-merge
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30028 - Added nullable property to Json mapped model resulting in errors instead of mapping non existing json property to null #30333

Merged

  • Fix to #28816 - Json: add support for Sqlite provider #30302
  • Fix to #30028 - Added nullable property to Json mapped model resulting in errors instead of mapping non existing json property to null #30101
